Sentencas: We investigated the residual strain of each membrane electrodes in plasma-sprayed solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC), which are under the cyclic redox treatments.
Titulo: Evaluations of the residual strains in the plasma sprayed multi-layer electrodes of the solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The results show that all of the components of SOFC reveal compressive residual stress after plasma spraying.
Titulo: Evaluations of the residual strains in the plasma sprayed multi-layer electrodes of the solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: However, the stress states of these components become complicated and irregular after the redox treatments.
Titulo: Evaluations of the residual strains in the plasma sprayed multi-layer electrodes of the solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The strain state of both LSCM (La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Mn0.5O3-delta) buffer layer and anode was changed from compressive to tensile.
Titulo: Evaluations of the residual strains in the plasma sprayed multi-layer electrodes of the solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: We also found that the original stress state was changed when the upper component was deposited.
Titulo: Evaluations of the residual strains in the plasma sprayed multi-layer electrodes of the solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: For example, the original stress state was 0.78% in compressive; after the NiO/LDC (Ce0.55La0.45O3-delta) anode deposited on the LSCM buffer, the anode side of LSCM revealed the compressive strain with 3.34% and the matrix side of LSCM revealed the tensile strain with 10.65%.
Titulo: Evaluations of the residual strains in the plasma sprayed multi-layer electrodes of the solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Two kinds of strain states coexisted in an electrode coating resulted in the electrode failure occurred in the reverse position of stress states.
Titulo: Evaluations of the residual strains in the plasma sprayed multi-layer electrodes of the solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Therefore, the redox treatments indeed affect the strain state of the SOFC components and the influences on the cell durability should not be ignored.
Titulo: Evaluations of the residual strains in the plasma sprayed multi-layer electrodes of the solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The more research results will be described in detail.
Titulo: Evaluations of the residual strains in the plasma sprayed multi-layer electrodes of the solid oxide fuel cell
Evaluations of the residual strains in the plasma sprayed multi-layer electrodes of the solid oxide fuel cell
